title: duck_house_roof_reused_structure_empty_state
summary: Roof structure of a duck house constructed using reused materials, currently without animals.
description: Image documents the roof and supporting structure of a duck house. The roofing materials were reused from a former carport. At the time of recording, the shelter is empty and not occupied by animals.
context_notes: Structure remains functional despite current non-use
Documents empty-state condition as part of continuous farm record

external_reference.note: Image shows duck house roof structure without animals present.
